## Annotations - Store Values

Annotations are a subset of user content. Each annotation type has it's own
store.

### Flag StoreValue
Stored in the flag store.

```typescript
interface FlagStoreValue {
    colorCode: String;
    productId: String;
    id: String;
    pageIndex: Number;
}
```

### Highlight StoreValue
Stored in the highlight store.

```typescript
interface HighlightStoreValue {
    colorCode: String;
    productId: String;
    end: String;
    id: String;
    start: String;
}
```

### Note StoreValue
Stored in the note store.

```typescript
interface NoteStoreValue {
    colorCode: String;
    productId: String;
    highlightId: String;
    id: String;
    location: {
        pageIndex: Number;
        pageX: Number;
        pageY: Number;
        path: String;
    };
    path: String;
    marginAffinity: String;
    text: String;
    type: String;
}
```
